content.prompt: How do the events and actions presented in the first two paragraphs (“A timely . . . behind me”) serve to heighten the subsequent impression made by Boxsious on the reader?

choices.label: They encourage the reader to mistrust the narrator’s cheery optimism.
They persuade the reader to share the narrator’s growing confidence.
They guide the reader to anticipate a dramatic change in the narrator’s life.
They establish a false expectation for the reader of an unremarkable session.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
